readme: Introductory content pack for the SAIX initiative, establishing the geopolitical landscape and the Director's initial challenges in 2025.

items.headline: The Great Decoupling: Brussels Faces the Void
items.body: As the clock struck midnight on January 1st, the final data packet exchange between the US-led Clean Path and China's Great Firewall ceased. Europe now finds itself adrift in a digital no-man's land. With proprietary silicon and cloud stacks locked behind nationalistic borders, the newly formed Sovereign AI and Infrastructure eXchange (SAIX) represents the continent's last gamble for technological relevance. Experts warn that without a unified backbone, the European single market will collapse into a series of disconnected analog islands.
items.flavor: The silence from the trans-Atlantic cables is deafening.

items.headline: Directive 001: Operational Commencement
items.body: To the Director: Your appointment comes at a moment of existential crisis. The budget allocated by the Council is final; there will be no supplementary funds. You are tasked with consolidating fragmented regional data centers into a unified sovereign mesh. Expect resistance from member states wary of centralized control. You must navigate the technical debt of two decades while fending off industrial espionage. The five-year countdown to total digital autonomy begins now. We await your first deployment plan.
items.flavor: Power is not given; it is built in the server room.

items.headline: #SAIX or #SILENCE? The Great Infrastructure Debate
items.body: Thread by @TechNomad_EU: 1/10 We're officially cut off. No more AWS, no more Alibaba Cloud. The government says SAIX is the answer, but can they really build a decade's worth of infra in five years? 2/10 I'm seeing local pings spike. Our current hardware is literal junk compared to the US N-series chips. 3/10 If the Director fails, we're back to analog. 4/10 Does anyone even know who is running this? #DigitalSovereignty #SAIX #2025
items.flavor: Public sentiment is a volatile fuel.
